titleInfo.title: Conway Twitty and Loretta Lynn at Kentucky Fair (17324)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing Conway Twitty and Loretta Lynn with Billy Craddock and Mickey Gilley at the Kentucky Fair and Exposition Building on March 13. Poster features metal photoplates of Conway Twitty, Loretta Lynn, Billy Craddock and Mickey Gilley. For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/25314.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
